 */

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    //freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    int t, n, k, x, y, ans;
    string s;
    for(cin >> t;t--;)
    {
        cin >> n >> k >> s;
        bool c = false;
        ans = 0;
        for(int i = 0, j;i < s.length();)
        {
            j = i+1;
            while(j < s.length() and s[i] == s[j]) j++;
            x = (j - i) / k;
            y = (j - i) % k;
            if(x) c = true;
            if(y)
                ans += x + 1;
            else
                ans += x;
            i = j;
        }
        if(c)
            cout << ans << endl;
        else
            cout << -1 << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
